detailed_design.description: Fix port mismatch between frontend code (8001) and documentation (8000). Standardize on one port and update all references.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Decide on standard port (recommend 8000). 2. Update frontend API URL. 3. Update documentation. 4. Add environment variable for API URL. 5. Update .env.example.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want the frontend to connect to the backend without configuration.
